description: Veterans Affairs Canada (VAC) requires the services of a cleaning company to provide daily and ad hoc cleaning services at the Borden, ON Transition Centre.
duration_in_months: While the exact duration of the proposed contract is unknown at present, this term is between 27-31 months
full_summary:
**Office Cleaning Services**
=====================================================

*   **Tender Title:** Office Cleaning Services
*   **Reference Number:** cb-386-97800339
*   **Solicitation Number:** 3000771554
*   **Publication Date:** 2024-02-27
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-04-09 13:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-05-01
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** 2026-03-31

Details of Tender:
--------------------

*   **Classification:** Cleaning and janitorial services, building maintenance and cleaning
*   **Services Required:** Daily and ad-hoc cleaning services to the Borden, ON Transition Centre
*   **Location:** Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region (NCR)
*   **Contract Type:** Competitive Request for Proposal (RFP)

Notice Information:
-------------------

*   **Published by:** Veterans Affairs Canada
*   **Amendment Number:** 6
*   **Amendment Date:** 2024-04-09
*   **Tender Status:** Expiré (Expired)

Pre-Qualification Document:
-----------------------------

Please refer to the attached bidder pre-qualification document to ensure compliance with contract requirements prior to making a submission.

To learn more about the requirements and submit your interest to participate in the tender, please view or download the official tender notice: [CanadaBUs public tenders](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/), search for the solicitation number (3000771554).
